availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George W. Thompson (Rockville, Indiana, court clerk & commissioner of deeds for Ky)

body.p: Parke County, Indiana, court clerk. Virginia native. Married to Sarah M. Thompson. Father of Emeline Thompson, Maggie Thompson. Merchant in Parke County, Indiana, in 1850. Clerk of Parke County Court in Rockville, Indiana, in 1860.Appointed commissioner of deeds for Kentucky in Rockville, Indiana, by Beriah Magoffinon November 8, 1860. Attorney in Parke County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Indiana, Parke County, District 85, p. 339A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Indiana, Parke County, Rockville, p. 419.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), Parke County, IN, June 1863, p. 260.
KYR-0001-017-0003.
